abandonallhope.ui

Class GameCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • abandonallhope.ui.GameCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler

    public class GameCanvas
extends Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler
    Contains game field presentation and events.
    Author:
    kipsu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameCanvas(Items items)
      Creates a new game canvas and drawer classes to draw objects on game field.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSurvivorSelectorEventListener()
      Adds a selection event to game canvas for selecting survivors.
      void addTrapHoverEventListener(Trap trap)
      Adds event listeners to display a shadow of a trap before building it and listener that will handle the trap building once the building location is clicked.
      void addWallHoverEventListener(Wall wall)
      Adds event listeners to display a shadow of a wall before building it and listener that will handle the wall building once the building location is clicked.
      void changeToBuildHoverEventListener(Wall wall)
      Removes wall hover event from game canvas.
      javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas getCanvas() 
      javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext getGc() 
      void handle(javafx.event.Event t) 
      void removeSurvivorSelectorEventListener()
      Removes a survivor selection event from game canvas.
      void removeTrapBuildingEventListeners()
      Remove event listeners for building traps.
      void removeWallBuildingEventListeners()
      Remove all event listeners for building a wall and add survivor selector event listener.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • addWallHoverEventListener

        public void addWallHoverEventListener(Wall wall)
        Adds event listeners to display a shadow of a wall before building it and listener that will handle the wall building once the building location is clicked.
        Parameters:
        wall - wall element containing information about the wall type

      • changeToBuildHoverEventListener

        public void changeToBuildHoverEventListener(Wall wall)
        Removes wall hover event from game canvas.
        Parameters:
        wall - wall element containing information about the wall type

      • removeWallBuildingEventListeners

        public void removeWallBuildingEventListeners()
        Remove all event listeners for building a wall and add survivor selector event listener.

      • addTrapHoverEventListener

        public void addTrapHoverEventListener(Trap trap)
        Adds event listeners to display a shadow of a trap before building it and listener that will handle the trap building once the building location is clicked.
        Parameters:
        trap - trap element containing information about the trap type

      • removeTrapBuildingEventListeners

        public void removeTrapBuildingEventListeners()
        Remove event listeners for building traps.
